CustomField.inlineHelpText: HMIS-compliant housing type for last permanent address.
CustomField.label: Last Permanent Address Type

value.fullName: Foster care home or foster care group home
value.label: Foster care home or foster care group home

value.fullName: Jail, Prison or Other Juvenile Facility
value.label: Jail, Prison or Other Juvenile Facility

value.fullName: Substance Abuse Treatment Facility or Detox Center
value.label: Substance Abuse Treatment Facility or Detox Center

value.fullName: Residential project of halfway house with no homeless criteria
value.label: Residential project of halfway house with no homeless criteria

value.fullName: Owned by Client, No Housing Subsidy
value.label: Owned by Client, No Housing Subsidy

value.fullName: Owned by Client, With Housing Subsidy
value.label: Owned by Client, With Housing Subsidy

value.fullName: Rental by client, with no ongoing housing subsidy
value.label: Rental by client, with no ongoing housing subsidy

value.fullName: Rental by Client, with other ongoing housing subsidy
value.label: Rental by Client, with other ongoing housing subsidy

value.fullName: Staying or Living in a Family Member's Room, Apartment or House
value.label: Staying or Living in a Family Member's Room, Apartment or House

value.fullName: Staying or Living in a Friend's Room, Apartment, or House
value.label: Staying or Living in a Friend's Room, Apartment, or House

value.fullName: Permanent Housing for Formerly Homeless Persons
value.label: Permanent Housing for Formerly Homeless Persons

value.fullName: Transitional Housing for Homeless Persons (including homeless youth)
value.label: Transitional Housing for Homeless Persons (including homeless youth)
